participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and enthusiastic about trying new things, especially food.
participant_1.background: hey there i'm 23 and i love food. i have been traveling the world for a years. i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i also like to cook but i'm not very good at it. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, enjoys a simple lifestyle with a love for pets and toys.
participant_2.background: i have a pet turtle. i like to play with my dolls. i don't pick up my toys. my best friend lives next door.

content.text: i love mexican food , i love mexican food
